figure_1.title: FIGURE 1.
figure_1.caption: Sampling scheme for analysis of administrative codes

figure_2.title: FIGURE 2.
figure_2.caption: Sensitivity and specificity of administrative code combinations for identifying confirmed and probable cases (%)

claims.sentence:
RESULTS
Our initial 10% stratified random sample from NEDSS consisted of 147 confirmed, 56 probable, 52 suspected cases and 219 not a case reports, resulting in a total of 474 reports (Figure 1).

Beginning with the LD code, we added each of the eight remaining codes by an “or” statement to the previous code set, thus increasing sensitivity (74%) and decreasing specificity (37%) compared with using the LD code 088.81 alone (Figure 2).

RESULTS
